title: Arabic 48
text: For everything there is a sign. The sign of love is fortitude under My decree and patience under My trials.
teaser: For everything there is a sign...

prev.title: Arabic 47
prev.text: By My beauty! To tinge thy hair with thy blood is greater in My sight than the creation of the universe and the light of both worlds. Strive then to attain this, O servant!

next.title: Arabic 49
next.text: The true lover yearneth for tribulation even as doth the rebel for forgiveness and the sinful for mercy.
